overview: This file controls the grid sizes of the inventory slots for the game’s various UI windows.  These values are measured in pixels on the screen.

data_fields.name: class
data_fields.description: This is a reference field to define the type of inventory screen

data_fields.name: invLeft
data_fields.description: Starting X coordinate pixel position of the inventory panel

data_fields.name: invRight
data_fields.description: Ending X coordinate pixel position of the inventory panel (Includes the “invLeft” value with the inventory width size)

data_fields.name: invTop
data_fields.description: Starting Y coordinate pixel position of the inventory panel

data_fields.name: invBottom
data_fields.description: Ending Y coordinate pixel position of the inventory panel (Includes the “invTop” value with the inventory height size)

data_fields.name: gridX
data_fields.description: Column number size of the inventory grid, measured in the number of grid boxes to use

data_fields.name: gridY
data_fields.description: Column row size of the inventory grid, measured in the number of grid boxes to use

data_fields.name: gridLeft
data_fields.description: Starting X coordinate location of the inventory’s left grid side

data_fields.name: gridRight
data_fields.description: Ending X coordinate location of the inventory’s right grid side (Includes the “gridLeft” value with the grid width size)

data_fields.name: gridTop
data_fields.description: Starting Y coordinate location of the inventory’s top grid side

data_fields.name: gridBottom
data_fields.description: Ending Y coordinate location of the inventory’s bottom grid side (Includes the “gridTop” value with the grid height size)

data_fields.name: gridBoxWidth
data_fields.description: Width size of an inventory’s box cell

data_fields.name: gridBoxHeight
data_fields.description: Height size of an inventory’s box cell

data_fields.name: rArmLeft

data_fields.name: rArmRight
data_fields.description: Ending X coordinate location of the Right Weapon Slot (Includes the “rArmLeft” value with the “rArmWidth” value)

data_fields.name: rArmTop
data_fields.description: Starting Y coordinate location of the Right Weapon Slot

data_fields.name: rArmBottom
data_fields.description: Ending Y coordinate location of the Right Weapon Slot (Includes the “rArmTop” value with the “rArmHeight” value)

data_fields.name: rArmWidth
data_fields.description: The pixel width of the Right Weapon Slot

data_fields.name: rArmHeight
data_fields.description: The pixel Height of the Right Weapon Slot
